classSpec.desc: the class of elements used to provide information about people and their relationships.
the class of elements used to provide information about people and thir relationships.
classe di elementi utilizzati per fornire informazioni relative a persone e relazioni tra le stesse
clase de elementos utilizados para proporcionar informaciones relativas a personas y a las relaciones entre estas.

remarks.p: This class is not populated unless the namesdates module is included in a schema.
